about_the_game:
Descend into a mansion dungeon that shifts and writhes to deceive and kill you anew with each playthrough. Take hold devious weapons and slumbering artifacts dredged from the shadows. Brave dark corridors and forgotten horrors, thirsty for your blood. The house has you in its hold - descend and survive, seek release.

Woe to all who enter...

Features

  • Brutal and gritty combat has you destroying body tiles to sap monster health and devastate combat abilities. Blind, maim, and weaken before landing the killing blow.
  • Wield devious weapons to savagely dissect the things that sport and crawl in the dark. Slash, shoot, shred, explode, or light them aflame. Survive any way you can.
  • Equip bizarre artifacts to increase your chance of survival, but beware their power does not turn on you.
  • Strategically disassemble horrific monsters with grim efficiency. Master your enemy’s anatomy, uncover their weaknesses, and use the perfect weapon to bring them down in ruins.

Brave dark corridors and forgotten horrors, thirsty for your blood. The house has you in its hold - descend and survive, seek release.

  • Wield devious weapons to savagely dissect the things that sport and crawl in the dark. Slash, shoot, shred, explode, or light them aflame. Survive any way you can.
  • Equip bizarre artifacts to increase your chance of survival, but beware their power does not turn on you.
  • Strategically disassemble horrific monsters with grim efficiency. Master your enemy’s anatomy, uncover their weaknesses, and use the perfect weapon to bring them down in ruins.

name: WOE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (particles disabled)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 (or greater) highly recommended to avoid down-scaling
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 (or greater) highly recommended to avoid down-scaling

short_description: Dismantle horrific monsters in real-time gallery combat, descending through random dungeons in search of new weapons, tools, and bizarre artifacts to stave off death a little longer. Woe to all who enter...
